title: Chicken curry pasta salad
ingredients: ['1 chicken stock cube', '250g skinless, boneless chicken breasts', '250g fresh mushrooms, sliced', '225g macaroni', '120ml soured cream', '120ml mayonnaise', '1 clove garlic, chopped', '1 teaspoon curry powder', '100g black olives, chopped', '1 apple - peeled, cored and sliced', '1 yellow pepper, thinly sliced', '2 sticks celery, chopped', 'salt and pepper to taste']
